name: Car Dealer Job Simulator
description:
Get ready for an exciting career as a Car Dealer, work as an auto showroom manager, and run a car business. Start a car showroom business and become a real car tycoon. Buy new and used cars, place them in the showroom to sell and earn money. Grow your car business and sell sedan, sports, supercars. Start from scratch and build your car dealer business.

Car Dealer is a real job simulator in which you run your own car showroom. Buy & sell used cars. Earn money and upgrade your showroom, buy new cars from the car factory and expand your business. Grow your car business, increase revenue, and become a car tycoon.

Game Features:
Start Your Car Dealer Business
Buy and Sell Cars
Grow Your Business
Become a Car Tycoon

Enjoy the amazing gameplay and give us your feedback to help improve the game in future releases.
